mapper.select:
SELECT RE.* FROM T_MENU M, T_USER U, T_ROLE R, T_USER_ROLE UR, T_ROLE_MENU RM, T_MENU_RESOURCES MR, T_ROLE_RESOURCES RR, T_RESOURCES RE WHERE ( ( R.ROLEID = RM.ROLEID AND RM.MENUID = M.ID AND M.ID = MR.MENUID AND MR.RESOURCESID = RE.RESOURCESID ) OR ( R.ROLEID=RR.ROLEID AND RR.RESOURCESID=RE.RESOURCESID ) ) AND U.USERID = UR.USERID AND UR.ROLEID = R.ROLEID AND U.`STATUS`=1 AND R.`STATUS`=1 AND RE.RESOURCESSTATUS=1 AND U.USERNAME=#{currentUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY RE.RESOURCESID
